scripts.deploy-goerli: truffle compile && truffle migrate --network goerli && truffle run verify CengliP2PEscrow --network goerli
scripts.deploy-avax: truffle compile && truffle migrate --network avax && truffle run verify CengliP2PEscrow --network avax
scripts.deploy-mumbai: truffle compile && truffle migrate --network mumbai && truffle run verify CengliP2PEscrow --network mumbai
